title: How AI is transforming freelance journalism
description: A spate of articles by a freelance journalist named Margaux Blanchard appeared in major English-language publications in 2025. But the pieces, including first-person essays for Business Insider and a Wired feature on couples getting married in the Minecraft game, were not what they appeared to be. Margaux Blanchard didn’t exist. After an editor grew suspicious...
